name: Very Dungeon
description:
You awake in the middle of an empty room and don't remember anything.

You try to escape but don't get too far, falling on a spike bed.

You awake in the middle of a storage room and don't remember anything.

Your clothes are pierced and have blood on them. You try to escape but don't get too far, being eaten by a gigant spider.

You awake in the middle of a dungeon and don't remember anything.

You awoke in the middle of...

Very Dungeon!

Features:

  • Infinite levels, one screen
  • 10 different upgrades/items
  • 2 playable characters
  • And many more mysteries...
Made in 48h for LD31
